Uses of Class
org.efaps.db.databases.AbstractDatabase

  • Packages that use AbstractDatabase 
    Package Description
    org.efaps.db
    This package contains all classes related to the eFaps-DataBase.
    org.efaps.db.databases
    Wrappers to be able to work with different Databases.

    • Uses of AbstractDatabase in org.efaps.db

      Methods in org.efaps.db that return AbstractDatabase 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AbstractDatabase<?> Context.getDbType()
      Returns the database type of the default connection (database where the data model definition is stored).

    • Uses of AbstractDatabase in org.efaps.db.databases

      Classes in org.efaps.db.databases with type parameters of type AbstractDatabase 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDatabase<T extends AbstractDatabase<?>>
      Abstract definition of database specific information and methods like alter of table columns.
      Subclasses of AbstractDatabase in org.efaps.db.databases 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DerbyDatabase
      The class implements Apache Derby specific methods for data base access.
      class  MySQLDatabase
      Database class for the MySQL database.
      class  OracleDatabase
      The database driver is used for Oracle databases starting with version 9i.
      class  OracleDatabaseWithAutoSequence
      The database driver is used for Oracle databases starting with version 9i.
      class  PostgreSQLDatabase
      Database class for the PostgreSQL database.
